Condor:

Condor looked up and saw Bodicons shooting him a net. he avoided the 
shot and lost inside forest... but he didn't notice that he was 
leaving a trace of mechfluid wherever he was....

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Sorry, I forgot to put my other chars in that last post
> ::Composer/Symphony/Bodicons/Skullgrin/Triggerhappy::
> 
>      Composer looked at Wheeljack.
> 
>      "Once the Lavacons get here, we'll be done in no time.  I 
really think that if we work together, we can make the Alliance the 
most powerful faction on this rock!" Composer said with enthusiasm.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>         Symphony woke up, lifting his head off of the control room 
board.
> 
>        "Ugh, I must've fell asleep.  I'm bored.  I'm going to 
explore the land, see what I can find," He said, walking tiredly 
outside.
> 
>         Symphony walked through a forest.  He was quite a ways from 
the CF now.  He still felt a little tired, so he sat against a tree 
trunk, and laid his little music playing device beside him.  
Listening to music helped him greatly to feel relaxed, and get some 
shut-eye.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>         Decapitron was now slowing down, as he was under Condor.  
He rolled down the window on Legtrap's side.
> 
>         "Legtrap, see if you can trap that Maximal!!!" He commanded.
> 
>          Legtrap nodded.  He sort of stood, half his body out the 
window.  Then, he got out a special gun.  He fired a big energon net 
up at Condor, in attemp to bring the bird Maximal down.  Meanwhile, 
Headshot sat comfortably, awaiting orders from Decapitron before 
doing anything.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>         Gutclaw picked up the Decepticon distress signal.
> 
>         "Explobody, let's go towards that signal!  If it's some 
Decepticons, we welcome them, if it's a trap, we slag any bots 
there," He yelle up to Explobody.
> 
>         Explobody nodded, as well as a mechanical bird can, and 
then flew off towards the signal.  Gutclaw followed, running fast in 
mechanical leopard mode, looking back to see if any of the other 
Decepticons were coming.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>         Skullgrin recieved the Decepticon distress signal as well.  
He went off towards it.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>         Triggerhappy picked up the distress signal from Africa.  He 
backed off from Angel Prime, and landed then transformed to robot 
mode, with Blowpipe in his hand.  He opened his com to Cyclonus.
> 
>          "Cyclonus, are you getting that distress signal?  
Skullgrin and the two newbies(Bodicons)look like they are going after 
it.  What should we do?" He asked.
